name: Chefrog
description:
Peppy is a young frog, son of a world-class chef. One day, Peppy's father is absent and he sees this as an opportunity to show off all his courage and bravery putting his father's dishes together in this chaotic kitchen frenzy!
Put the required dishes together by uniting the ingredients in sequence before Peppy spits the food whole (He will start sweating when that's about to happen)!
